Package io.github.coho04.dcbcore.discord.commands

Class Restart

java.lang.Object
io.github.coho04.dcbcore.discord.commands.Restart
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandInterface
public class Restart extends Object implements CommandInterface
The Restart class implements the CommandInterface to handle the "restart" slash command. This command restarts the bot.
